column5: I've been spending the weekends and holidays up at Jack Lake in Apsley where we have a trailer and doing lots of fishing of course. I have a favourite place to fish which is just "around the bend" from the camp that I love to fish in my canoe and have been doing so since I was 10yrs old. Needless to say, my 2 boys have fished there with me as well. My oldest is busy working so it's just me and the young lad fishing these days. This past weekend we hit the spot with the canoe and caught a few nice ones in the skinny water. As we were paddling home, I said to my son, "you keep casting and I'll paddle". Within 2 mins he had nice hit on his white "rage tail" and fought the hog like a pro through the slop. Could a father be more proud???  Here are a few pics of our outting this weekend. I love getting showed up this way.  Colin  A nice one to start the weekend. Caught on a YUM Horny Toad.   Brody said he liked the "Rage Tail"   A colourful litte guy.   I guess he does like the "Rage Tail".   I think the $6000.00 smile say's it all! LOL
Great report Collin Nothing beats getting on the water with our kids.
Nice going. Great fishing with your son. That is the best $6000 you'll ever spend.
That's a brute . Great sharing our relaxation time with our kids
Good stuff, Colin. That slop looks like perfect LM water. Even better with a canoe. Thanks for sharing.
Great to get out in the canoe - looks like you are the bow man? Kids, eh? Brody has it all under control including the fishing  Great largies!
Great stuff!! Looks like you both had a great day on the water.
WTG buddy!! The young lad will be outfishing you in no time! (not that it's some great feat  hahaha

Thanks for the comments guys. It's hard to believe that about 3 weeks ago we had dad's 17ft Princecraft in that slop. Now we can barely get the canoe in there. It's still a great place to fish......even if we don't catch anything. Blue Heron's, turtles, deer, and other wildlife usually keeps us entertained.
Nice to see he has his mother's looks  Great job -- love to see the kid's "catching" it  Kevin
You got that right Kev!! lol
Good on Ya Colin  Your Son's smile says it all!!  Just think 4 months 'till "Hard Water"  Rick
